name: Unown X
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

poke_power.name: X-RAY
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown X on your Bench, you may look at the top card of your opponent’s deck and put it back on top of his or her deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
